'''''A World Known Only Unto Roses''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Memories of the Heart]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to read Noelle's study notes after completing ''[[Gift and Intent#The Almighty Maid and Her Impossible Task|The Almighty Maid and Her Impossible Task]].''
